name: Amazing Auto Gallery
description:
This is a janky procedural image gallery.

Control with WASD and mouse, ESC to return to selection screen, exit with alt-f4 (classy)

Observed jank:

1) Large amount of image files with crap out the app, be modest

2) Lighting is meh, whatever

3) Some collisions might jank out

4) Cursor in menu is broken

That project is experimental and would not be updated
